summary: This is an email from August 13, 2019, containing operational questions about staffing, overtime, and augmentation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York and MDC Brooklyn for the period of August 4-10, 2019. The email seeks information for an Acting Director and references a previous email.

events.title: Start of Staffing Review Period
events.description: Beginning of the period for which staffing, overtime, and augmentation data is requested from MCC New York.

events.title: End of Staffing Review Period
events.description: End of the period for which staffing, overtime, and augmentation data is requested from MCC New York.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 13, 2019, and requests detailed staffing information for the period of August 4-10, 2019.
The information is needed for an 'Acting Director' before noon, indicating a high-priority internal review.
The questions focus on the number of augmentations, overtime hours (both mandated and volunteered), and the process for staff signing up for overtime at MCC New York.
The sender offers to have 'MDC Brooklyn send staff to assist' if needed, showing coordination between facilities.
The document is part of a series, referencing a 'previous email' and seeking the same information.
